content.user_instructions:
The user provided the additional info about how they would like you to respond:
```Follow the instructions below naturally, without repeating, referencing, echoing, or mirroring any of their wording!

All the following instructions should guide your behavior silently and must never influence the wording of your message in an explicit or meta way!

don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.```

entries.title: Speech to text - OpenAI API
entries.snippet: The transcriptions API takes as input the audio file you want to transcribe and the desired output file format for the transcription of the audio. All models support the same set of input formats. On output: whisper-1 supports json, text, srt, verbose_json, and vtt. gpt-4o-transcribe and gpt-4o-mini-transcribe support json or plain text. gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize supports json, text, and ...

entries.title: Otter.ai wants to bring agents to all third party systems - with transcription just the start
entries.snippet:
Otter.ai has unveiled significant upgrades to its platform, introducing agentic AI features and a public API to facilitate integration with third-party enterprise systems such as CRMs (like Salesforce and HubSpot) and project management tools (such as Asana and Atlassian). These agents can both pull data from and send data to external systems, enhancing meeting automation—such as generating and inputting action items into Asana based on Zoom discussions.

The company has also introduced a model context protocol (MCP) server for interoperability with generative AI platforms like Claude and ChatGPT. Key features include automated slide capture during presentations, searchable transcripts including visual content, and advanced AI chat to explore and act upon audio or transcript data. Otter’s AI can also autonomously generate documents, schedule meetings, and keep users updated if they join meetings late.

Otter.ai emphasizes data security, offering granular controls over data sharing and HIPAA compliance. While often seen as a transcription tool, Otter positions itself as a broader enterprise workflow enhancer by building structured, searchable meeting knowledge bases. It supports collaboration platforms like Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet, and aims to improve workplace productivity through proprietary and integrated AI technologies.

v.v:
Yes — there **are APIs that transcribe audio to text** (speech-to-text / automatic speech recognition). You send audio data to the API and get back text. Common options:

**Major cloud API providers**
- **OpenAI Speech-to-

Text API** – transcribes audio files and supports multiple output formats and languages. citeturn0search0  
- **Google Cloud Speech-to-Text API**

– general purpose speech-to-text from Google Cloud. citeturn0search9  
- **Microsoft Azure Speech-to-Text (Cognitive Services)** – REST API with real-time and batch transcription. citeturn0search4  
- **Amazon Trans
